name: Battle Berdysz [1]
effect: VIT ＋6,[Alloy Mail] ＋[Battle Berdysz]: each auto attack causes Amistr's Atk increases by 3%; the effect lasts 5 seconds, and can stack 3 times at most.

description: Although they looks no different from other boots, They are only fie the marksman.

name: Battle Wish
description: In the new year, Make wishes to Shycent, You'll receive blessings: for 1 hour your Base, Job EXP received by killing wild monsters will have 100% bonus.

name: Bazerald [1]

name: Beach Hat
description: On the noisy beach, the girl is selling her beach-hat. This seems to be a distinctive hat, With white satin and red plantains making it much attractive. (thank you very much for your purchase. This beautiful ornament is unavailable on the exchange during the activity, the transaction will be normal after the period. By Ina, July 2017.)
